headline: Knopf Names 4th Publisher in Over a Century
abstract: Ms. Arthur, previously the publisher at Little, Brown, succeeds Sonny Mehta, who died late last year.
lead_paragraph: Alfred A. Knopf announced Thursday that Reagan Arthur is its new publisher, succeeding Sonny Mehta, who died at 77 in December after more than three decades at the helm of the august literary imprint.
